column18: Targets' attack rolls and saving throws are deducted 1d4.
Targets add 1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws.
Speak 1 word command to target. Can't cause harm. Doesn't affect undead.
Compel target to attack you one-on-one.  See Sourcebook.
HEAL: 1d8 + spellcasting ability modifier. No effect on undead or constructs.
Know location of aberration/celestial/elemental/fey/fiend/undead/(un)holy ground.
Sense presence of magic. Use action to see auras around creatures/objects.
Sense location and type of disease/ poison/ or poisonous creature.
Your weapon attacks deal extra 1d4 radiant DAM on a hit.
Restrain target. Large and bigger creatures have advantage to save.
Magical counterattack to taking damage.
Immune to being frightened. Temp HP equal to casting ability modifier each turn.
Mark quarry. Extra 1d6 DAM on weapon hit. Advantage on rolls to find it.
Inflict necrotic damage on target.
Protect against certain types of creatures.  See Sourcebook.
All nonmagical food and drink in range is rendered free of poison and disease.
Those choosing to attack target must make WIS save or choose new target.
Target takes initial DAM and CON save at start of each turn or take 1d6 fire.
Target gains +2 bonus to AC.
Understand and speak to beasts. Get info about nearby locations and monsters.
Attack target takes extra thunder DAM and STR save or pushed 10 ft. and prone.
Target hit also makes WIS save or is frightened. WIS save to end effect.
Each target also increases maximum HP by 5.
Target becomes visible/ sheds dim light.
Charm humanoid to attack your target of choice.  Use action to keep control.

column10: bat fur and pitch or coal
column18: Creates darkness normal light can't dispel. Dispels light spells <= 2nd level.
Summons a spirit in the form of a steed.  See Sourcebook.
Target is paralyzed. New saving throw at end of turn.
End one disease or condition (blind/ deaf/ paralyzed/ poisoned) on target.
Sense object direction within 1000 ft. or locate it within 30 ft.
Nonmagical weapon becomes +1.
Teleport <= 30 ft. away to unoccupied location.
DAM taken entering/start turn in beam. Shapechanges disadvantage to save.
Target has 1 poison neutralized/ advantage on poison save/ resists poison DAM.
You know which fail saves. They can't lie but know of spell and can be evasive.
Creates skeleton or zombie servant that accepts simple directions
Use bonus action to HEAL 1 target in aura.
Targets get advantage on WIS and death saving throws; heal spells heal max.
Curse target.  See Sourcebook.
Next melee attack target takes DAM and is blinded until spell ends.
Create 45 lbs. of bland/ nourishing food for 24 hours and 30 gallons of water.
Nonhostiles in aura deal an extra 1d4 radiant DAM.
Creates bright light. Dispels darkness spells <= 3rd level it overlaps with.
End spell <= 3rd level. For >= 4th level/ casting ability check DC=10+spell level.
Weapon is +1 to hit and +1d4 acid/ cold/ fire/ lightning/ or thunder DAM.
Doubles speed. +2 AC. Advantage on DEX saves. Additional action to Dash.
Hinder one creature type within cylinder.  See Sourcebook.
Cast short term (creatures move 1/4 speed) or long term (double food yield).
Creature gains resistance to one of: acid/ cold/ fire/ lightning/ or thunder.
Remove curse creature or break object's curse attunement to any target.
Raise creature that died within 1 minute to 1 HP. Doesn't restore missing parts.
Gain necrotic resistance/ HEAL 1 HP if at 0 HP/ HP max can't go down.
Gain poison resist/ disease immune/ advantage on status saving throws.
Banish target to another plane; native of other plane doesn't return after 1 min.
Plants have disadvantage on save and take max DAM.
Targets can't take reactions and do random actions.  See Sourcebook.
1 use: Target drops to 1 HP instead of 0 HP or negates instant kill effect.
Teleport yourself and ally to location. If occupied/ 4d6 force DAM and spell fails.
Immune to difficult terrain/slow/paralyze/restrain. Spend 5ft to escape restrain.
Create spectral guardian that attacks hostiles. Leaves after dealing 60 DAM.

column10: pinch of dust/ drop of water
column18: Storm's area of effect becomes difficult terrain until end of next turn.
Sense creature direction within 1000 ft. or locate it within 30 ft.
WIS save or disadvantage on attack & ability checks; can't take reactions.
Target gains resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning/ piercing/ and slashing DMG.
Target banished if <= 50 HP.
Friendlies: advantage on saving throws against magic/effects. No half DAM.
Ask 3 yes/no questions that are answered by deity.  See Sourcebook.
Gain knowledge of the land around you.  See Sourcebook.
Give creature a disease.  See Sourcebook.
Targets in circle take thunder DAM/ then radiant or necrotic DAM; go prone.
Fey/undead/extraplanar creatures have disadvantaged attacks. See Sourcebook.
Charm humanoid to give it commands. Has advantage to save if attacking it.
Creatures take fire and radiant damage.
Target must perform task you set. 5d10 psychic DAM whenever it disobeys.
Target is paralyzed. New saving throw at end of turn. Doesn't work on undead.
Return target to life with 1 HP.  See Sourcebook.
Spy on a target located on the same plane as you.  See Sourcebook.
Enter one tree and emerge from another 500 ft. away. Use once per round.
